TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted but your wish is ruined so I can't do that

i wish your computer would get a BSoD

Granted.

You end up with two broken legs(ouch)

I wish I could make my code work the way I want.

no, this is absolutely not related to the code I'm trying to make

Granted. Since it is not the code youre making, it now is. Also, its gone Horribly Right.

I wish I could build a power armor suit.

Granted. Have fun wearing it. listen to this starting at 3:44:40. Its a normal human in MJOLNIR powered armor.

https://youtu.be/33ZvvbHImy0?t=3h44m40s IT TOOK FOREVER TO FIND THAT SEGEMENT LOL

I wish for a lemon meringue pie, in front of me, on a plate.

Edited March 27, 2015 by r4pt0r

Granted. It's rotten.

I wish for a new power supply

Granted. You get a giant super mega ultra power coil that causes all of your wireless devices to catch on fire.

I wish for all forms of technology to duplicate themselves.

Granted because of 2 object existing in the same place the universe explodes (I think that's how it works ÃŽâ€)

I wish for a real life level 1 magikarp

sad you got a mewtwo totally out of any level scale it's a bit weird but friendly most of the time anyway.

Easy, i just wish i do not camp the forums games sub forum.
Granted you now camp in the Russian forum ÃŽâ€

I wish people would abide by the game rules, but I see that's already been corrupted.

So, I wish for a pony of my very own, instead.

Granted. It is Pinkie Pie.

Enjoy your insanity!

I wish I could be insane.

granted, I throw you off a boat and into the seine river, you are in_saeine....

I wish I could finish all my work fast for once...

Edited March 29, 2015 by Nemrav

granted. But you don't do them in a proper fashion and you have to redo them afterward.

I wish I could fly.

Granted. You get rammed into by a plane, and get sucked into the turbine engine.

I wish for actual skill in KSP.

Granted. You gain pyrotechnics skills, but no spaceflight-related ones.

I wish for a new mobile phone.

granted. It is non-functional and does not come with a guarantee.

I wish for happiness.

Granted you get I virus called happiness

I wish for a mushroom cloud

Granted. However, you are presented with a design of the popular video game character in the shape of a mushroom.

I wish I didn't have to do all these science assignments.

Granted, a nuclear winter ensures that you won't have to do another science assignment in your life.

I wish for the Mona Lisa.

Granted. She is now living with you, and you two are not getting along, with her being dead for so long and all.

I wish to be a helicopter pilot (I wonder how that could go wrong)

Granted. Helicopters are deemed unsafe and abandoned like zeppelins, leaving you jobless and penniless.

I wish for a pencil that never needs sharpening or runs out of lead.

Granted. Helicopters are deemed unsafe and abandoned like zeppelins, leaving you jobless and penniless.

I wish for a pencil that never needs sharpening or runs out of lead.

Granted you get a pen

I wish this wasn't happening to my text.

Granted! it is now this small and hard to read like this.

I wish I could have better wifi at home.

Granted. You get outstanding WIFI in the basement.

I wish I could own Castlevania IV. Urges, man... I need to play it.

Granted. But its a region locked copy and you don't have a device set to the right region to play it, thus making it effectively useless.

I wish I had a time machine.
